text:
Question 169) You want to buy glasses for glasses. Lenses must have closer thicknesses of the 3 mm measure. In the stock of a store, there are thick lenses: 3.10 mm; 3,021 mm; 2.96 mm; 2,099 mm and 3.07 mm. If the lenses are purchased in this store, the chosen thickness will be, in millimeters,
A) 2.099.
B) 2.96.
C) 3.021.
D) 3.07.
E) 3.10.
